intro: Chamaesyce microcephala, commonly known as the small-headed sand mat, is a low-growing, mat-forming plant native to the southwestern United States and northern Mexico. Chamaesyce microcephala is often found in sandy or gravelly soils along riverbanks and in desert scrub habitats.
